Why You Should Use Azure Credit Union

Azure Credit Union is the future of banking where money can be sent anywhere, anytime and you can hold your own private keys.

01

All credit card companies

Pay with Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, JCB and Union Pay with a few simple taps.​

02

Touchless payments​

Tap to pay with Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, JCB, Union Pay and more.​

03

Multi Currency

Pay with your Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, JCB, Union Pay and more in just a few quick taps.

Get Started

"Wow what great service, I love it!"

I recently opened an account with Azure Credit Union and I’ve been impressed with the process. Everything was completed quickly and easily through their website. 

"Azure Credit Union is the real deal! It's really wonderful."

I’ve been using Azure Credit Union for a few months now and I’ve had a great experience. The account opening process was straightforward and the website is easy to use. 

"I will refer everyone I know."

I switched to Azure Credit Union a few months ago and I’ve been very pleased with my decision. The online banking platform is user-friendly and the customer service is excellent.
